attributes.action: Bring HMV (His Master's Voice) to Exchange, Ilford. Ideally replacing Bodycare.
attributes.background: In Exchange Shopping Centre, located in Ilford, East London, bring the music/entertainment store HMV (His Master's Voice) into it, ideally to replace the store "Bodycare" which has closed down.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

We also can't accept petitions which call for actions with regard to named individuals, organisations or businesses. We also can’t accept petitions that call for action at a local level.
